METHOD.name: database_export
METHOD.DESC: Creates a zip archive of a local database partition with all its blob objects, and returns a path to that zip archive.

METHOD.name: database_import
METHOD.DESC: Imports the database and blob objects from a zip archive created with database_export. If the imported archive is inconsistent, or other failure occurs during the import process, the original database will be restored.

PARAM.name: partition
PARAM.DESC: the local database partition to be replaced by the zip.

PARAM.name: path_to_zip
PARAM.DESC: path to the zip archive created with database_export.

METHOD.name: database_full_reset
METHOD.DESC: Imports the database and blob objects from a zip archive created with database_export. If the imported archive is inconsistent, or other failure occurs during the import process, the original database will be restored.

PARAM.name: reset_client_info
PARAM.DESC: true to clean the client_info table, false otherwise.

PARAM.name: reset_local_models
PARAM.DESC: true to clean local (non-synced) models, false otherwise.

METHOD.name: database_full_reset_and_logout
METHOD.DESC: Deletes all records from the property bag and model tables. For examples, see Resetting the Database in Using the Local Database with Rhom.

METHOD.name: database_fullclient_reset_and_logout
METHOD.DESC: Reset the Rhodes model database and logout. Equivalent to Rhom::Rhom.database_full_reset(true) followed by SyncEngine.logout.
